content.prompt: Which of the following statements might be considered a valid interpretation of the speaker’s perspective throughout the poem?

choices.label: She understands that relationships must navigate pitfalls along the route.
She continues to imagine her companion’s innate thoughts even though she may be wrong.
She experiences how adults lose touch with the merriment of childhood.
She identifies her companion’s distraction as the cause of her loneliness and despair.

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
